full_summary:
# Adaptive Oxygen Filler Adapter Tender Announcement

### Tender # [W8485-247725/A]

#### Deadline for Submissions: October 17th, 14:00:00

#### National Defence Contract

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposal submissions to provide adaptive oxygen filler adapters. The contracted items will be delivered to the 25 CFSD Montreal facility by December 15, 2023.

#### Procurement Details

*   *Procurement Method:* Competitive - Open Bidding
*   *Procurement Category:* Goods and Services
*   *Notice Type:* Request for Proposal
*   *Trade Agreements:* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   *Solicitation Number:* W8485-247725/A
*   *Contracting Entity Name:* National Defence
*   *Contracting Entity Address Line: * 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

#### Item Specifications

*   *Item 1*, *GSIN: * 25202607, *NSN: * 1730-21-899-6630, *Adapter, Oxygen Filler*:
    -   *Quantity:* 20
    -   *Unit of Issue:* EA
    -   *Part No.: * T186C100-11
    -   *NCAGE:* 30941

#### Bid Submission

*   Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the model, brand name and/or part number and NCAGE they are offering.
*   Proposal submissions can be submitted electronically to expedite the evaluation process.
*   Further details can be found in the attached bid solicitation document.

#### Contact Information

*   Auditorie Poissant-Viau
*   *Contact Information Email:* audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca
*   *Contact Information Telephone:* 00

#### Submission Requirements

*   All bid-submission documents are to be delivered to the specified address by the October 17th deadline.
*   Please find the attached file, which includes the bid solicitation and more details.

#### Additional Information

*   The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

[Reference Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9095/w8485-247725
